pageContext.description: Dimensions: L 149.3mm; We 93.3mm; Wbt 39.6mm; maxT 11mm,Typology: poorly defined edge bevels - possibly double on rev. face; some body angles crisp & angular - other points rounded; butt crude and rounded; max T towards butt; sides approx. flat; face sl. undulating; sl twist in body - otherwise sym profile.,Manufacture: hollows in both faces - prob. cg. defects - on rev. some are in form of linear strands,Condition: much of edge good and sharp, but interspersed with fairly regular notches - dents, apparently ancient - no brighter colouration; score marks diagonal across one face - nor discoloured - ancient?
pageContext.collection: London,Society of Antiquaries Collection, B39,(v. possibly that formerly in the collection of Gustavys Brander - illustrated (a))
pageContext.site: unprovenanced,source a) may illustrate this piece
pageContext.remarks: Labels/Markings: white ink B33,Archive: PIF,PRBAF: DF (C); SI,Ext. CI,Rec: SN Feb 79,Source: MV,Old Card: 1
